title: Women and children to lose out most from Home Office plan to tighten rules on refugee family reunions, experts say – UK politics live
summary: The Refugee Council warns that proposed financial and language requirements for refugees will either divide families or compel them to undertake perilous journeys. title: Afghanistan earthquake live: more than 800 dead after shallow quake strikes country’s east, state media reports
